com.ctriposs.bigmap.page
接口 IMappedPage

所有已知实现类：
MappedPageImpl
public interface IMappedPage

Memory mapped page file ADT

方法摘要
 void flush()
          Persist any changes to disk
 java.nio.ByteBuffer getLocal()
          Get a thread local copy of the mapped page buffer
 java.nio.ByteBuffer getLocal(int position)
          Get a thread local copy of the mapped page buffer
 byte[] getLocal(int position, int length)
          Get data from a thread local copy of the mapped page buffer
 java.lang.String getPageFile()
          The back page file name of the mapped page
 long getPageIndex()
          The index of the mapped page
 boolean isClosed()
          Check if this mapped page has been closed or not
 void setDirty(boolean dirty)
          Set if the mapped page has been changed or not
 

方法详细信息

getLocal

java.nio.ByteBuffer getLocal(int position)
Get a thread local copy of the mapped page buffer

参数：
position - start position(relative to the start position of source mapped page buffer) of the thread local buffer
返回：
a byte buffer with specific position as start position.

getLocal

java.nio.ByteBuffer getLocal()
Get a thread local copy of the mapped page buffer

返回：
a byte buffer with specific position as start position.

getLocal

byte[] getLocal(int position,
                int length)
Get data from a thread local copy of the mapped page buffer

参数：
position - start position(relative to the start position of source mapped page buffer) of the thread local buffer
length - the length to fetch
返回：
byte data

boolean isClosed()
Check if this mapped page has been closed or not

返回：

setDirty

void setDirty(boolean dirty)
Set if the mapped page has been changed or not

参数：
dirty -

java.lang.String getPageFile()
The back page file name of the mapped page

返回：

getPageIndex

long getPageIndex()
The index of the mapped page

返回：
the index
